PackageOracle.name: DA_LINEAR_CONTENT_SOURCE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_LINEAR_CONTENT_SOURCE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.58.405247000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,linear_content_source_nm IN VARCHAR2
,linear_content_source_desc IN VARCHAR2
,call_sign IN VARCHAR2
,eidr_video_service_id IN VARCHAR2
,supports_hdtv_ind IN NUMBER
,supports_sap_ind IN NUMBER
,is_ownd_and_oper_affilt_ind IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,call_sign_nm IN VARCHAR2
,tribune_source_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,linear_content_source_nm IN VARCHAR2
,linear_content_source_desc IN VARCHAR2
,call_sign IN VARCHAR2
,eidr_video_service_id IN VARCHAR2
,supports_hdtv_ind IN NUMBER
,supports_sap_ind IN NUMBER
,is_ownd_and_oper_affilt_ind IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,call_sign_nm IN VARCHAR2
,tribune_source_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,linear_content_source_id IN NUMBER
,linear_content_source_nm IN VARCHAR2
,linear_content_source_desc IN VARCHAR2
,call_sign IN VARCHAR2
,eidr_video_service_id IN VARCHAR2
,supports_hdtv_ind IN NUMBER
,supports_sap_ind IN NUMBER
,is_ownd_and_oper_affilt_ind IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,call_sign_nm IN VARCHAR2
,tribune_source_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,linear_content_source_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_linear_content_source;

body.name: DA_LINEAR_CONTENT_SOURCE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_LINEAR_CONTENT_SOURCE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.58.418131000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,linear_content_source_nm IN VARCHAR2
,linear_content_source_desc IN VARCHAR2
,call_sign IN VARCHAR2
,eidr_video_service_id IN VARCHAR2
,supports_hdtv_ind IN NUMBER
,supports_sap_ind IN NUMBER
,is_ownd_and_oper_affilt_ind IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,call_sign_nm IN VARCHAR2
,tribune_source_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_linear_content_source.add(fx), parms=' || linear_content_source_nm || '|' || linear_content_source_desc || '|' || call_sign || '|' || eidr_video_service_id || '|' || supports_hdtv_ind || '|' || supports_sap_ind || '|' || is_ownd_and_oper_affilt_ind || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || call_sign_nm || '|' || tribune_source_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_linear_content_source a
(
a.linear_content_source_id
,a.linear_content_source_nm
,a.linear_content_source_desc
,a.call_sign
,a.eidr_video_service_id
,a.supports_hdtv_ind
,a.supports_sap_ind
,a.is_ownd_and_oper_affilt_ind
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.call_sign_nm
,a.tribune_source_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_linear_content_source_id.NEXTVAL
,add.linear_content_source_nm
,add.linear_content_source_desc
,add.call_sign
,add.eidr_video_service_id
,add.supports_hdtv_ind
,add.supports_sap_ind
,add.is_ownd_and_oper_affilt_ind
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.call_sign_nm
,add.tribune_source_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.linear_content_source_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_linear_content_source.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,linear_content_source_nm IN VARCHAR2
,linear_content_source_desc IN VARCHAR2
,call_sign IN VARCHAR2
,eidr_video_service_id IN VARCHAR2
,supports_hdtv_ind IN NUMBER
,supports_sap_ind IN NUMBER
,is_ownd_and_oper_affilt_ind IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,call_sign_nm IN VARCHAR2
,tribune_source_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_linear_content_source.add, parms=' || linear_content_source_nm || '|' || linear_content_source_desc || '|' || call_sign || '|' || eidr_video_service_id || '|' || supports_hdtv_ind || '|' || supports_sap_ind || '|' || is_ownd_and_oper_affilt_ind || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || call_sign_nm || '|' || tribune_source_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_linear_content_source a
(
a.linear_content_source_id
,a.linear_content_source_nm
,a.linear_content_source_desc
,a.call_sign
,a.eidr_video_service_id
,a.supports_hdtv_ind
,a.supports_sap_ind
,a.is_ownd_and_oper_affilt_ind
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.call_sign_nm
,a.tribune_source_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_linear_content_source_id.NEXTVAL
,add.linear_content_source_nm
,add.linear_content_source_desc
,add.call_sign
,add.eidr_video_service_id
,add.supports_hdtv_ind
,add.supports_sap_ind
,add.is_ownd_and_oper_affilt_ind
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.call_sign_nm
,add.tribune_source_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_linear_content_source.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,linear_content_source_id IN NUMBER
,linear_content_source_nm IN VARCHAR2
,linear_content_source_desc IN VARCHAR2
,call_sign IN VARCHAR2
,eidr_video_service_id IN VARCHAR2
,supports_hdtv_ind IN NUMBER
,supports_sap_ind IN NUMBER
,is_ownd_and_oper_affilt_ind IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,call_sign_nm IN VARCHAR2
,tribune_source_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_linear_content_source.add, parms=' || linear_content_source_id || '|' || linear_content_source_nm || '|' || linear_content_source_desc || '|' || call_sign || '|' || eidr_video_service_id || '|' || supports_hdtv_ind || '|' || supports_sap_ind || '|' || is_ownd_and_oper_affilt_ind || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || call_sign_nm || '|' || tribune_source_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_linear_content_source a
(
a.linear_content_source_id
,a.linear_content_source_nm
,a.linear_content_source_desc
,a.call_sign
,a.eidr_video_service_id
,a.supports_hdtv_ind
,a.supports_sap_ind
,a.is_ownd_and_oper_affilt_ind
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.call_sign_nm
,a.tribune_source_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.linear_content_source_id
,add.linear_content_source_nm
,add.linear_content_source_desc
,add.call_sign
,add.eidr_video_service_id
,add.supports_hdtv_ind
,add.supports_sap_ind
,add.is_ownd_and_oper_affilt_ind
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.call_sign_nm
,add.tribune_source_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_linear_content_source.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,linear_content_source_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_linear_content_source.del, parms=' || linear_content_source_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_linear_content_source a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.linear_content_source_id = del.linear_content_source_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_linear_content_source.del');

END del;

END da_linear_content_source;
